page.title: 09Henry Morgan
page.content: {Henry Morgan}was a relative of the{ {Morgan}family who lived in{Tredegar {House.}He was kidnapped as a child and was taken to the West Indies. There he was sold as a slave but he escaped when he grew up. He joined up with some buccaneers and went to live in Jamaica. One day he robbed a city called Panama. He took all the gold and treasure and killed a lot of people. The people of Spain were mad and he was captured and taken to England to be hung. The King made him a knight for what he had done.
